title: [Diamond+] LF mid and support players for OOL

replies.body:
Hi guys, would love to join your team!
My peak rank is Platinum 1 (I know I'm not diamond but I'm very close and I think my game knowledge that has accumulated over the past 5 years makes up for it), and I play all roles comfortably except ADC.
I use Discord and Skype primarily! And I am also a capable shotcaller if needed.

Mid champs: Pretty much anyone
Support: Thresh, Leo, Naut, Zyra, Brand, Karma, Blitz, Morg etc etc

Heres my OPGG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Blizzard9789
